title: From Zevala's Shore â€” Again and Again
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:blankstyle]]


[[=]]
+ From Zevala's Shore -- Again and Again
++ Seven Devils
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
[[image again1.png]]
[[image again2.png]]

------

[[collapsible show="SHOW TRANSCRIPT" hide="HIDE TRANSCRIPT"]]

Turning and turning, the widening of the gyre,

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/on-guard-43-hub Or so the story goes,]

The falconer's cries falling deaf to the falcon,

Above the way the wind blows.

Rise and fall, throughout all times,

Worlds from A to Z.

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5243 The cycle rages across all lines,]

And thus I call out to thee:

@@ @@

The tides are rising -- must we run forever more?

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8141 Sand grains in the wind,]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8273 Blue flowers on the shore.]

Surely we shall one day tire,

And as such fall to the jaws of the gyre.

@@ @@

For once, just once, let us stand our ground,

Let not these great beasts sink their fangs to their tails.

Cease the wheel, cease the cycle,

All things must come to an end

Least of all, we keep doing this

Again and again. 
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
author: Dino--Draws
